thread.title: Excellent place to start exploring London
thread.title_full: Excellent place to start exploring London - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: javalevo
title: Excellent place to start exploring London
text: Excellent place to start exploring London. The people ar the reception were very Friendly. The room was proper. Good shower. We only slept in the hotel and took a shower. Those were Good. It is located near the Hammersmith Subway with a direct cennection to Heathrow.
